Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.description: Manage your CityLAB Berlin knowledge base.
Dashboard.addKnowledgeDescription: Add new content to the knowledge base. Embed URLs and review extracted content.
Dashboard.browseKnowledgeDescription: View and manage all content in the knowledge base. Search, filter, and organize your knowledge.
Dashboard.goToChatDescription: Return to the chat interface and interact with the CityLAB Berlin knowledge assistant.
Dashboard.engineRoomDescription: Access the Mastra UI to monitor and manage AI workflows and agent configurations.

Knowledge.pageDescription: View all content in the CityLAB Berlin knowledge base.
Knowledge.noDocumentsDescription: Start by adding content to the knowledge base.
Knowledge.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This will remove all {chunkCount} chunks from the knowledge base. This action cannot be undone.
Knowledge.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, URL, author, or tag...
Knowledge.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters to find what you're looking for.

AddDocument.pageDescription: Enter a URL or paste text to extract metadata and embed the document into the CityLAB Berlin knowledge base.
AddDocument.sourceHelp: Provide the original source URL so the agent can cite it in responses.
AddDocument.textHelp: Paste the full text content you want to add to the knowledge base. Metadata will be extracted automatically.
AddDocument.documentRejected: Document was rejected and not embedded.
AddDocument.reviewDescription: Review and edit the metadata before embedding this document.
AddDocument.title: Title
